entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Snow level 1600 metres. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
